Title: Dogtooth
Actors: Christos Stergioglou, Michele Valley, Angeliki Papoulia, Hristos Passalis
Plot: Three teenagers live isolated, without leaving their house, because their over-protective parents say they can only leave when their dogtooth falls out.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 20 wins & 19 nominations.
Production: Greek Film Center, Horsefly Productions, Boo Productions
